title: Technology-Integrated Instructional Design for Enhancing Human Anatomy Education

context.additional_context: High repetition rates in anatomy courses lead to overcrowded classes. The situation requires technology integration and enhanced interactivity

learning_goals: Students can accurately identify and explain major human body system organs using a 3D anatomy application.
Students can reconstruct anatomical concepts through peer assessment and feedback using online collaboration tools
Students can understand and apply core anatomical terminology with an accuracy rate of over 80% on a smartphone-based quiz platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
